imdb.plot outline: "The Gospel Truth" chronicles the lives of 5 Gospel Recording Artist & Public Figures their ups, downs, triumphs, struggles, and stories, of those who desire to inspire the world through their gift. The Gospel Truth gives you a peek inside lives of these Artists/Public Figures while learning and experiencing their compelling truths, and t h o u g h they have real life trials The Gospel Truth allows you to see how they have dealt with and are dealing with these tribulations, struggles, and challenges. You see them juggling the demands of being an Artist/Public Figures. You watch their assertive interesting personalities as they make a daily choice to pursue their dreams. You struggle with them through their failures, cry with them as their storylines unfold one by one, and go with them on their roller-coaster ride of hard work, consistency, and achieving one common goal. While it may not all be pretty, amazing, nor glamorous it is certainly the Gospel Truth.
imdb.title: The Gospel Truth
plot: "_The Gospel Truth_ (qv)" chronicles the lives of 5 Gospel Recording Artist & Public Figures their ups, downs, triumphs, struggles, and stories, of those who desire to inspire the world through their gift. _The Gospel Truth_ (qv) gives you a peek inside lives of these Artists/Public Figures while learning and experiencing their compelling truths, and t h o u g h they have real life trials _The Gospel Truth_ (qv) allows you to see how they have dealt with and are dealing with these tribulations, struggles, and challenges. You see them juggling the demands of being an Artist/Public Figures. You watch their assertive interesting personalities as they make a daily choice to pursue their dreams. You struggle with them through their failures, cry with them as their storylines unfold one by one, and go with them on their roller-coaster ride of hard work, consistency, and achieving one common goal. While it may not all be pretty, amazing, nor glamorous it is certainly the Gospel Truth.::Keyun Moon
